name: Monster Dump Truck Jeopardy
description:
Do you want to be a part of this amazing demolition derby style Monster Dump Truck battle in this closed arena where you must last the longest, take the least damage, and score the most points within the limited time.
* High tech 3D rendering, physics, collisions and interaction.
* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
